attributes.additional_details:
Why wait until 2018 for the Tory government to have a referendum on staying in the EU. If it is that important for them to include it in their next manifesto e, let's have it now.  Allot of people could come here by that time putting unacceptable strain  on our services like hospitals,education etc. So  lets have a referendum this year. I suggest June 30th .


I would like the government to arrange the referendum on Britain staying in or leaving the EU by June 30th 2013
